item.title: 泰国旅游业不景气和家庭债务对其贷款人造成压力
item.description: 由于家庭债务高企、旅游业放缓和消费支出低迷，泰国银行正努力应对贷款疲软的问题，这有可能影响其今年余下时间的前景。【原文：Thailand’s banks are grappling with weak lending amid high household debt, slowing tourism and sluggish consumer spending that risk dampening their outlook for the rest of the year.】

item.title: 穆巴达拉（Mubadala）、AXA IM Prime 参股私人信贷公司 Hayfin
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份声明，穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Co.【原文：Mubadala Investment Co. and AXA IM Prime are taking minority stakes in leading European private credit lender Hayfin Capital Management, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 英伟达芯片挑战者 FuriosaAI 赢得首个主要客户 LG
item.description: 位于首尔的初创公司 FuriosaAI Inc.试图设计芯片与英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：FuriosaAI Inc., the Seoul-based startup seeking to design chips to compete with Nvidia Corp., has sealed its first major contract months after rejecting an $800 million acquisition offer from Meta Platforms Inc.】

item.title: 特朗普瞄准贸易漏洞，中国对美出口七成面临风险
item.description: 据彭博经济报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普通过其贸易伙伴在全球供应链中针对中国的努力，有可能削弱中国的经济增长及其对美国的大部分出口。【原文：President Donald Trump’s effort to target China through its trading partners across global supply chains threatens to erode the country’s growth and most of its exports to the US, according to Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 泰国任命降息倡导者维泰领导中央银行
item.description: 泰国挑选了一位与政府关系密切的降息倡导者担任下一任央行行长，以消除人们对货币当局独立性可能受到削弱的担忧。【原文：Thailand picked a rate-cut advocate with close ties to the government as its next central bank governor, defying concerns over a potential erosion of the monetary authority’s independence.】

item.title: 北欧联合银行与瑞典初创企业 Mynt 签订中小企业平台合同
item.description: 北欧联合银行（Nordea Bank Abp）已邀请瑞典一家为金融服务业提供白标产品的初创公司 Mynt AB 提供服务，以改进其面向北欧地区中小型公司的平台。【原文：Nordea Bank Abp has enlisted the services of Mynt AB, a Swedish startup offering white-label products for the financial services industry, to improve its platform for small and mid-sized companies in the Nordic region.】

item.title: 英格兰银行考虑搁置数字英镑计划
item.description: 英国央行官员正在考虑是否搁置为家庭创建数字英镑的计划，因为人们对该项目的益处越来越怀疑，这是全球范围内对国家支持的数字货币的支持不断减少的最新迹象。【原文：Bank of England officials are mulling whether to set aside plans to create a digital pound for households amid growing skepticism over the project’s benefits, the latest sign of dwindling support for state-backed digital currencies globally.】

item.title: 尼日利亚在通胀前景明朗之前将维持利率不变
item.description: 尼日利亚中央银行的决策者们准备在今年的第三次会议上维持借贷成本不变，以判断近期通胀放缓的持续性。【原文：Policymakers at the Central Bank of Nigeria are poised to leave borrowing costs unchanged at their third meeting of the year to gauge the durability of a recent slowdown in inflation.】

item.title: 匈牙利第 10 个月维持关键利率不变：决策指南
item.description: 在通胀反弹之后，匈牙利央行准备连续第十个月维持借贷成本不变。【原文：Hungary’s central bank is poised to keep borrowing costs unchanged for a 10th month after a rebound in inflation.】

item.title: 洛杉矶时报》亿万富翁老板计划将报纸上市
item.description: 这位亿万富翁周一晚告诉乔恩-斯图尔特（Jon Stewart），帕特里克-宋（Patrick Soon-Shiong）计划在明年将《洛杉矶时报》上市。【原文：Patrick Soon-Shiong plans to take the Los Angeles Times public over the next year, the billionaire owner told Jon Stewart on Monday night.】

item.title: 中国远洋在李嘉诚港口交易中获得否决权
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，中国最大的航运公司即将加入收购香港富豪李嘉诚海外港口的全球财团，并要求在该财团中担任重要角色，以获得中国政府对这一争议性交易的支持。【原文：China’s biggest shipping company is set to join the global consortium that’s acquiring Hong Kong tycoon Li Ka-shing’s overseas ports, and is requesting a powerful role in the group in order to secure Beijing’s blessing for the controversial deal, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 中国 1,670 亿美元大坝项目助推印度金属库存的乐观情绪
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 顶级安排人称印度首次公开募股将在 12 个月内筹集 300 亿美元资金
item.description: 据 Kotak Mahindra Capital Co.称，印度首次公开募股的热潮预计将持续下去，未来 12 个月内将有公司募集到超过 300 亿美元的资金。【原文：The boom in Indian initial public offerings is expected to continue, with companies poised to raise over $30 billion in the next 12 months, according to Kotak Mahindra Capital Co.】

item.title: 马来西亚寻求征收 20% 的特朗普税，但抵制美国对电动汽车和外资所有权的要求
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，马来西亚政府正在寻求将美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁征收的美国关税降至约 20%，但不愿满足有关电动汽车和外资所有权的某些要求。【原文：Malaysia’s government is seeking to lower US tariffs threatened by President Donald Trump to about 20%, but is reluctant to meet certain demands around electric vehicles and foreign ownership, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Astorg 支持的基金服务企业 IQ-EQ 收购 Gordian Capital
item.description: Astorg 支持的 IQ-EQ 收购了 Gordian Capital Ltd.，这是一家基金平台和服务提供商，在新加坡、香港、墨尔本、上海和东京设有办事处。【原文：Astorg-backed IQ-EQ has acquired Gordian Capital Ltd., a fund platform and services provider with offices in Singapore, Hong Kong, Melbourne, Shanghai and Tokyo.】

item.title: 日本股市在大选和核电利好后保持涨势
item.description: 日本股市上涨，但由于投资者消化了首相石破茂在周日上议院选举中的失利，东京股市收窄了最初的部分涨幅。【原文：Japanese shares rose but pared some of their initial gains in Tokyo as investors digested Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s loss in Sunday’s upper house election.】

item.title: 韩国考虑放宽敏感农产品关税以达成特朗普协议
item.description: 韩国将于 7 月 25 日与美国举行高级别贸易谈判，通过权衡可能重塑两个盟国之间关系的政治敏感让步，加快阻止全面关税的努力。【原文：South Korea will hold high-level trade talks with the US on July 25, accelerating efforts to head off sweeping tariffs by weighing politically sensitive concessions that could reshape ties between the two allies.】

item.title: 美国投资者撤资后，亚洲对冲基金 "新丝路 "关闭
item.description: 新加坡经营时间最长的对冲基金之一新丝路投资私人有限公司（New Silk Road Investment Pte）因回报疲软和美国投资者在亚洲的撤资导致资产急剧下降而关闭。【原文：One of Singapore’s longest-running hedge funds, New Silk Road Investment Pte, is shutting down after weak returns and a pullback by US investors in Asia led to a sharp drop in assets.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行认为 7 月降息与 "谨慎 "策略不符
item.description: 7 月份的会议记录显示，澳大利亚央行决定，在四次会议中第三次降息不符合其 "谨慎、渐进 "的宽松战略。【原文：Australia’s central bank decided that lowering interest rates for a third time in four meetings would not be consistent with its strategy of easing in a “cautious and gradual” manner, minutes of the July meeting showed.】

item.title: 中国产能过剩面临石油炼制企业顽强复苏
item.description: 就在中国政府努力解决工业产能过剩问题之际，中国炼油行业再次展示了其生存之道。【原文：China’s oil refining sector is once again showing its knack for survival just as Beijing seeks to tackle industrial overcapacity.】

item.title: 新西兰出口额下降，经济疲软的又一迹象
item.description: 新西兰的出口出现了近两年来的首次季度下降，这进一步表明年初经济的明显势头已经减弱。【原文：New Zealand posted its first quarterly decline in exports in almost two years, adding to signs that the momentum apparent in the economy at the start of the year has faded.】

item.title: 特朗普关税担忧重燃避险需求，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布的 8 月 1 日关税最后期限到来之前，投资者观望贸易谈判的进展，风险厌恶情绪有所恢复，黄金维持在一个月以来的最高点附近。【原文：Gold held near the highest in a month, as risk-off sentiment returned among investors watching the progress of trade negotiations ahead of US President Donald Trump’s Aug. 1 tariff deadline.】

item.title: 印度顶级养老基金经理押宝 30 年期债券
item.description: 印度一家顶级私人养老基金在经历了近期的大跌后，正在加倍购买 30 年期政府债券。【原文：A top private pension fund in India is doubling down on 30-year government bonds after a recent selloff.】

item.title: 韩国企业集团韩华海运订购首艘美国液化天然气运输船
item.description: 韩华海洋（Hanwha Ocean）的美国子公司韩华海运（Hanwha Shipping）向其关联公司韩华菲利船厂（Hanwha Philly Shipyard）订购了一艘液化天然气船，这是自 20 世纪 70 年代末以来订购的第一艘美国液化天然气船。【原文：Hanwha Shipping, the American subsidiary of Hanwha Ocean, ordered a liquefied natural gas vessel from its affiliate Hanwha Philly Shipyard, marking the first US LNG ordered ship since the late 1970s, the company said.】

item.title: 花旗策略师称印尼盾将在进一步上涨前盘整
item.description: 据印尼盾的顶级预测机构称，印尼盾近期的涨势将在下个月暂停，然后再回升到 12 月份的水平。【原文：The Indonesian rupiah’s recent gains are set to pause in the coming month before advancing to levels last seen in December, according to the currency’s top forecaster.】

item.title: 贸易谈判在最后期限前愈演愈烈，原油保持跌势
item.description: 由于美国与其贸易伙伴之间的谈判在下周的最后期限到来之前变得更加紧迫，石油价格在两次小幅下跌之后变化不大。【原文：Oil was little changed after two modest declines as talks between the US and its trading partners gain urgency ahead of next week’s deadline.】

item.title: 贝森特表示需要对美联储大楼翻新进行审查
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周一在社交媒体上发文称，应该对华盛顿美联储总部的部分翻修决定进行审查。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said in a social media post Monday that there should be a review of the decision to renovate parts of the Federal Reserve headquarters in Washington.】

item.title: 英国零售商要求在旅游计划中恢复免税购物
item.description: 英国零售商正再次努力说服英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）恢复游客免税购物，因为政府正准备制定促进所谓游客经济的计划。【原文：UK retailers are renewing efforts to persuade Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves to bring back tax-free shopping for tourists, as the government prepares to set out its plan to boost the so-called visitor economy.】

item.title: 中国子弟兵与同父异母兄弟姐妹的争斗发出接班警告
item.description: 几十年来，宗庆后一直是已故亿万富翁、饮料帝国杭州娃哈哈集团有限公司创始人宗庆后的独生女。 在独生子女政策时代，宗庆后努力培养她成为接班人，被誉为中国企业家的楷模。【原文：For decades, Kelly Zong had been known as the only child to her late billionaire father, the founder of beverage empire Hangzhou Wahaha Group Co. His effort to groom her as a successor was hailed as a model for Chinese entrepreneurs during the one-child policy era.】

item.title: 中国掉期曲线趋于正常，通缩担忧开始缓解
item.description: 中国货币市场的扭曲现象在持续了整整一年之后已经消失，这是一个初步迹象，表明投资者期望最新的刺激措施能够重振经济。【原文：A distortion in China’s money market has vanished after persisting throughout this year, a nascent sign that investors expect the latest stimulus efforts to reflate the economy.】
